Package cz.cuni.mff.desitka.dictionaries

Class Dictionary

java.lang.Object
cz.cuni.mff.desitka.dictionaries.Wiktionary
cz.cuni.mff.desitka.dictionaries.Dictionary
public class Dictionary extends Wiktionary
This class extends Wiktionary and provides methods to interact with a dictionary. It includes methods to get nouns, adjectives, and compounds. It also includes methods to check if all words are known and to get the genus of a word.

      Parameters:

      word2 - The second word.
      requiredCase - The required case.
      currentCase - The current case.
      Returns:
